title: Default value lost in list box of report parameter after modification
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. Steps to reproduce: 1. [Provide clear and complete steps here]
OB: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: Change the Display type to Combo Box. Expected result: The default value 'aaa' should remain as the default value. After completing step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the report parameter configuration. 2. Find the list box for setting the default value. 3. Set the default value to 'aaa'. 4. Modify the default value to 'bbb'. 5. Observe the state of the OK button.
